content.p: Being active is about finding out what works for you. That could be a short walk in the park, a beginner sport session or a fitness challenge. We have a huge range of options to help you find the right fit during your time here at the University of Nottingham. We have a fantastic range of great value membership options so you can take advantage of our award-winning fitness facilities, As well as offering beginner and social sessions, our clubs proudly represent the University of Nottingham at local, national and international level wearing Green and Gold. Try something new or just come along to meet new friends. With lots of different sports to try and no weekly commitment needed - Just Play is perfect for even the busiest of schedules. One of the largest campus league programmes in the country, our programme is great way to enjoy competitive sport on your doorstep and meet new friends. We have our own dedicated Inclusive Sport team to support students with a disability and/or long-term condition. We work closely with other University departments to offer accessible options for all students. As well as a range of staff sports clubs, we also offer social sports sessions and events just for staff at the University of Nottingham. Whether you're walking through campus, swimming in the pool, going for a run or cycling to work you can earn points through the free University of Nottingham Moves app. +44 (0)115 748 7000 sport@nottingham.ac.uk Find our opening times here.
